cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure on October 27, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 246, Federal Building Designation Legislation

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 6 (Monday, January 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GRIFFITH:
H.R. 246.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H123]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

title: To designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 180 West Main Street in Abingdon, Virginia, as the "H. Emory Widener, Jr., Federal Building and United States Courthouse".
